channel.title: CVE Feed for Fatcat Apps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fatcat Apps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27855|2024-09-17T01:36:20.861Z -- fatcat%20apps -- analytics%20cat%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Fatcat Apps Analytics Cat plugin <= 1.0.9 on WordPress allows Plugin Settings Change.

item.title: CVE-2021-36866|2024-09-17T00:05:46.101Z -- fatcat%20apps -- easy%20pricing%20tables%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (author or higher role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fatcat Apps Easy Pricing Tables plugin <= 3.1.2 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40311|2024-09-17T03:33:04.000Z -- fatcat%20apps -- analytics%20cat%20%E2%80%93%20google%20analytics%20made%20easy%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Fatcat Apps Analytics Cat plugin <= 1.0.9 on WordPress.
